Uses of Package
sage.scene.state

  • Packages that use sage.scene.state 
    Package Description
    sage.renderer  
    sage.renderer.jogl  
    sage.scene  
    sage.scene.state  
    sage.scene.state.jogl  
    sage.terrain  
  • Classes in sage.scene.state used by sage.renderer 
    Class and Description
    RenderState
    RenderState is the base class for deriving subclasses which affect the rendering of a given SceneNode.
    RenderState.RenderStateType
    Enumerates all possible types of RenderStates.
    RenderStateRecord
    This class is an abstract base class for deriving classes which hold information about a particular rendering state.
  • Classes in sage.scene.state used by sage.renderer.jogl 
    Class and Description
    RenderState
    RenderState is the base class for deriving subclasses which affect the rendering of a given SceneNode.
    RenderState.RenderStateType
    Enumerates all possible types of RenderStates.
  • Classes in sage.scene.state used by sage.scene 
    Class and Description
    RenderState
    RenderState is the base class for deriving subclasses which affect the rendering of a given SceneNode.
    RenderState.RenderStateType
    Enumerates all possible types of RenderStates.
  • Classes in sage.scene.state used by sage.scene.state 
    Class and Description
    BlendState.BlendEquation 
    BlendState.DestinationFunction 
    BlendState.SourceFunction 
    BlendState.TestFunction 
    RenderState
    RenderState is the base class for deriving subclasses which affect the rendering of a given SceneNode.
    RenderState.RenderStateType
    Enumerates all possible types of RenderStates.
    RenderStateRecord
    This class is an abstract base class for deriving classes which hold information about a particular rendering state.
    TextureRecord
    TextureRecord holds a record of the state of a Texture object.
    TextureUnitRecord
    TextureUnitRecord represents the state of a texture unit in OpenGL.
    ZBufferState.TestFunction
    Defines the test functions which can be applied in the ZBuffer (Depth Buffer) in an underlying graphics implementation.
  • Classes in sage.scene.state used by sage.scene.state.jogl 
    Class and Description
    BlendState
    BlendState maintains the state of the blending values of a particular node and its children.
    BlendStateRecord
    * BlendStateRecord holds a record of the current BlendState values stored in a RenderContext.
    RenderState
    RenderState is the base class for deriving subclasses which affect the rendering of a given SceneNode.
    RenderState.RenderStateType
    Enumerates all possible types of RenderStates.
    RenderStateRecord
    This class is an abstract base class for deriving classes which hold information about a particular rendering state.
    TextureRecord
    TextureRecord holds a record of the state of a Texture object.
    TextureState
    TextureState maintains the texture state for a given SceneNode.
    TextureStateRecord
    * TextureStateRecord holds a record of the current TextureState values stored in a RenderContext.
    TextureUnitRecord
    TextureUnitRecord represents the state of a texture unit in OpenGL.
    ZBufferState
    ZBufferState is an abstract description of one particular kind of RenderState: state information associated with the Z-Buffer, also called the Depth Buffer, in a graphics API-specific IRenderer implementation.
    ZBufferStateRecord
    ZBufferStateRecord holds a record of the current ZBufferState values stored in a RenderContext.
  • Classes in sage.scene.state used by sage.terrain 
    Class and Description
    RenderState
    RenderState is the base class for deriving subclasses which affect the rendering of a given SceneNode.
